articles.title: Adult Star Sophia Leone Dies At 26, Was "Found Unresponsive" At Home - NDTV
articles.description: Adult film star Sophia Leone has died at 26 after being found "unresponsive" in her apartment earlier this month, her stepfather Mike Romero said on Saturday.
articles.content:
Sophia Leone was born on June 10, 1997, in Miami in the US

articles.title: Know The Real Life Story Of Najeeb - Played By Prithviraj Sukumaran In 'The Goat Life' - ABP Live
articles.description: The trailer of Prithviraj Sukumaran’s survival drama 'The Goat Life', was released on Saturday. It is a true story of a Malayali migrant worker Najeeb who was forced into servitude.
